response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which is valued at $800,000 to both you and myself. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you at a price of $750,000. This represents a significant saving for you while allowing me to maintain a substantial return on my investment. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement that respects the value of the product while providing you with an attractive deal. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 750000}
